video.effects
Class VideoToBufferedImage

java.lang.Object
  video.effects.VideoToBufferedImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.media.Codec, javax.media.Controls, javax.media.Effect, javax.media.PlugIn
public class VideoToBufferedImage
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.media.Effect

Questa classe si occupa della conversione dei fotogrammi di uno stream video in oggetti BufferedImage.
